#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
	ll t,i,k,x;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x;
		if(x==0)
		{
			cout<<3<<endl;
		}
		else if(x==1)
		{
			cout<<1<<endl;
		}
		else if(x%4==0)
		{
			cout<<x<<endl;
		}
		else if(x%4==3)
		{
			cout<<x-1<<endl;
		}
		else cout<<-1<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
